text: @Nigel_Farage Let’s see the same video being done ‘under the cover of darkness’ Mr big bollocks 👍 then you might stand a chance of the majority actually believing you. Don’t bring COVID-19 into your topic of discussion, your too smart for that, prying on those lads to show you up 🖕🏼
